org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.core.api

Interface WebSocketConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MuxChannel, WebSocketSession

    public interface WebSocketConnection
extends BaseConnection
    Connection interface for WebSocket protocol RFC-6455.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.core.api.BaseConnection

        BaseConnection.SuspendToken

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WebSocketPolicy getPolicy()
      Access the (now read-only) WebSocketPolicy in use for this connection.
      String getSubProtocol()
      Get the SubProtocol in use for this connection.
      <C> void ping(C context, Callback<C> callback, byte[] payload)
      Send a single ping messages.
      <C> void write(C context, Callback<C> callback, byte[] buf, int offset, int len)
      Send a a binary message.
      <C> void write(C context, Callback<C> callback, ByteBuffer buffer)
      Send a a binary message.
      <C> void write(C context, Callback<C> callback, String message)
      Send a series of text messages.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.core.api.BaseConnection

        close, close, disconnect, getRemoteAddress, getState, isInputClosed, isOpen, isOutputClosed, isReading, onCloseHandshake, suspend

    • Method Detail

      • getPolicy

        WebSocketPolicy getPolicy()
        Access the (now read-only) WebSocketPolicy in use for this connection.
        Returns:
        the policy in use

      • getSubProtocol

        String getSubProtocol()
        Get the SubProtocol in use for this connection.
        Returns:
        the negotiated sub protocol name in use for this connection, can be null if there is no sub-protocol negotiated.

      • ping

        <C> void ping(C context,
            Callback<C> callback,
            byte[] payload)
          throws IOException
        Send a single ping messages.

        NIO style with callbacks, allows for knowledge of successful ping send.

        Use @OnWebSocketFrame and monitor Pong frames

        Throws:
        IOException

      • write

        <C> void write(C context,
             Callback<C> callback,
             byte[] buf,
             int offset,
             int len)
           throws IOException
        Send a a binary message.

        NIO style with callbacks, allows for concurrent results of the write operation.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • write

        <C> void write(C context,
             Callback<C> callback,
             ByteBuffer buffer)
           throws IOException
        Send a a binary message.

        NIO style with callbacks, allows for concurrent results of the write operation.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • write

        <C> void write(C context,
             Callback<C> callback,
             String message)
           throws IOException
        Send a series of text messages.

        NIO style with callbacks, allows for concurrent results of the entire write operation. (Callback is only called once at the end of processing all of the messages)

        Throws:
        IOException
